Nema User GuideÂ¶

Version:0.1.0
Release:0.1
Date:June 17, 2010

This manual details functions, modules, and objects included in Alinea.nema, describing what they are and what they do. For a complete reference guide, see nema_reference.

Warning

This “User Guide” is still very much in progress. Many aspects of Alinea.nema are not covered.

More documentation can be found on the openalea wiki.
